# Learning Outcomes

-   Import GIS polygon data into R and save them as simple feature data frame by using appropriate functions of sf package of R

-   Import aspatial data into R and save them as simple feature data frame by using appropriate functions of sf package of R

-   Computer accessibility measure by using Hansenâ€™s potential model and Spatial Accessibility Measure (SAM)

-   Visualise the accessibility measures by using tmap and ggplot2 packages.



# Data


# Getting Started


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tmap, SpatialAcc, sf, 
               ggstatsplot, reshape2,
               tidyverse)
```
:::



# Geospatial Data Wrangling


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL' from data source 
  `C:\guacodemoleh\IS415-GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex10\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagons <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "hexagons") 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `hexagons' from data source 
  `C:\guacodemoleh\IS415-GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex10\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 3125 features and 6 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 21506.33 xmax: 50010.26 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21 / Singapore TM
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eldercare <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "ELDERCARE") 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `ELDERCARE' from data source 
  `C:\guacodemoleh\IS415-GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex10\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 120 features and 19 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 14481.92 ymin: 28218.43 xmax: 41665.14 ymax: 46804.9
Projected CRS: SVY21 / Singapore TM
```
:::
:::



## Update CRS


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_transform(mpsz, 3414)
eldercare <- st_transform(eldercare, 3414)
hexagons <- st_transform(hexagons, 3414)
```
:::



## Cleaning geospatial data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eldercare <- eldercare %>%
  select(fid, ADDRESSPOS) %>%
  mutate(capacity = 100)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagons <- hexagons %>%
  select(fid) %>%
  mutate(demand = 100)
```
:::




# Aspatial Data Handling

## Import Distance Matrix



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ODMatrix <- read_csv("data/aspatial/OD_Matrix.csv", skip = 0)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distmat <- ODMatrix %>%
  select(origin_id, destination_id, total_cost) %>%
  spread(destination_id, total_cost)%>%
  select(c(-c('origin_id')))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distmat_km <- as.matrix(distmat/1000)
```
:::



# Hansen's Modelling and Visualisation of Accessibility


## Computing Hansen's Accessibility


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_Hansen <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                            eldercare$capacity,
                            distmat_km, 
                            power = 2, 
                            family = "Hansen"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(acc_Hansen) <- "accHansen"
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_Hansen <- tbl_df(acc_Hansen)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_Hansen <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_Hansen)
```
:::



Alternative method to the previous steps:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_Hansen <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                            eldercare$capacity,
                            distmat_km, 
                            #d0 = 50,
                            power = 0.5, 
                            family = "Hansen"))

colnames(acc_Hansen) <- "accHansen"
acc_Hansen <- tbl_df(acc_Hansen)
hexagon_Hansen <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_Hansen)
```
:::




## Visualising Hansen's Accessibility

### Extracting map extend


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mapex <- st_bbox(hexagons)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(hexagon_Hansen,
         bbox = mapex) + 
  tm_fill(col = "accHansen",
          n = 10,
          style = "quantile",
          border.col = "black",
          border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(eldercare) +
  tm_symbols(size = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Accessibility to eldercare: Hansen method",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 2,
            legend.outside = FALSE,
            legend.height = 0.45, 
            legend.width = 3.0,
            legend.format = list(digits = 6),
            legend.position = c("right", "top"),
            frame = TRUE) +
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.15) +
  tm_grid(lwd = 0.1, alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Statistical graphic visualisation



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_Hansen <- st_join(hexagon_Hansen, mpsz, 
                          join = st_intersects)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=hexagon_Hansen, 
       aes(y = log(accHansen), 
           x= REGION_N)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary", 
             fun.y="mean", 
             colour ="red", 
             size=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



# KD2SFCA Method of Modelling and Visualising Accessibility



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_KD2SFCA <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                            eldercare$capacity,
                            distmat_km, 
                            d0 = 50,
                            power = 2, 
                            family = "KD2SFCA"))

colnames(acc_KD2SFCA) <- "accKD2SFCA"
acc_KD2SFCA <- tbl_df(acc_KD2SFCA)
hexagon_KD2SFCA <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_KD2SFCA)
```
:::



## Visualising KD2SFCA's Accessibility


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(hexagon_KD2SFCA,
         bbox = mapex) + 
  tm_fill(col = "accKD2SFCA",
          n = 10,
          style = "quantile",
          border.col = "black",
          border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(eldercare) +
  tm_symbols(size = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Accessibility to eldercare: KD2SFCA method",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 2,
            legend.outside = FALSE,
            legend.height = 0.45, 
            legend.width = 3.0,
            legend.format = list(digits = 6),
            legend.position = c("right", "top"),
            frame = TRUE) +
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.15) +
  tm_grid(lwd = 0.1, alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Statistical Graphic Visualisation


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_KD2SFCA <- st_join(hexagon_KD2SFCA, mpsz, 
                          join = st_intersects)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=hexagon_KD2SFCA, 
       aes(y = accKD2SFCA, 
           x= REGION_N)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary", 
             fun.y="mean", 
             colour ="red", 
             size=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



# Spatial Accessibility Measure Method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_SAM <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                         eldercare$capacity,
                         distmat_km, 
                         d0 = 50,
                         power = 2, 
                         family = "SAM"))

colnames(acc_SAM) <- "accSAM"
acc_SAM <- tbl_df(acc_SAM)
hexagon_SAM <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_SAM)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(hexagon_SAM,
         bbox = mapex) + 
  tm_fill(col = "accSAM",
          n = 10,
          style = "quantile",
          border.col = "black",
          border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(eldercare) +
  tm_symbols(size = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Accessibility to eldercare: SAM method",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 2,
            legend.outside = FALSE,
            legend.height = 0.45, 
            legend.width = 3.0,
            legend.format = list(digits = 3),
            legend.position = c("right", "top"),
            frame = TRUE) +
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.15) +
  tm_grid(lwd = 0.1, alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-25-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Statistical Graphic Visualisation


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_SAM <- st_join(hexagon_SAM, mpsz, 
                       join = st_intersects)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=hexagon_SAM, 
       aes(y = accSAM, 
           x= REGION_N)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary", 
             fun.y="mean", 
             colour ="red", 
             size=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-27-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
